books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: Five interrelated families grapple with the events of the 1960s through the 1980s; Book 3 of the Century Trilogy.
books.name: EDGE OF ETERNITY

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher, a former military cop, helps the State Department and the C.I.A. stop a sniper who has targeted a G8 summit.
books.name: PERSONAL

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Twenty-five years after their high school romance ended, two classmates return to their North Carolina town for a funeral.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Claire Randall, an English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: A child murderer who eluded capture years ago has resurfaced, giving the forensic anthropologist Temperance Brennan another chance to stop her.
books.name: BONES NEVER LIE

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: Deacon is a cold man with an ugly past; then he meets Cassidy in the Colorado mountains. Book 4 of the Unfinished Heroes series.
books.name: DEACON

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Laurann Dohner
books.description:
Kat, an undercover agent on a dangerous mission, becomes passionately entangled with Darkness; 
Book 12 of the New Species series.
books.name: DARKNESS

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A North Carolina pediatrician is held captive by a mysterious man who forces her to question her life.
books.name: MEAN STREAK

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Volume 2 of the Outlander series, about an 18th-century Scottish warrior and a time-traveling World War II-era nurse.
books.name: DRAGONFLY IN AMBER

books.author: by Paulo Coelho
books.description: In this fable, a Spanish shepherd boy ventures to Egypt in search of treasure and his destiny. First  published in 1993.
books.name: THE ALCHEMIST

books.author: by Jan Karon
books.description: Father Tim Kavanagh returns to his native town to find friends and family wrestling with difficulties.
books.name: SOMEWHERE SAFE WITH SOMEBODY GOOD

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael White
books.description: The world’s most exclusive detective agency has opened an office in Australia, and within days Craig Gisto and his new team have their hands full with a series of grisly crimes.
books.name: PRIVATE DOWN UNDER
